title: President Zardari expresses concerns over health of Sultan of Brunei Darussalam
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 27 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Tuesday expressed his deep concern over the health of Sultan Haji Hassanal Bolkiah of Brunei Darussalam.
He prayed for his speedy recovery, enduring strength, and well-being, a Presidencyâ€™s news release said.
The President said that his thoughts and heartfelt wishes were with His Majesty and the people of Brunei Darussalam during this time.
